title: Build. Launch. Grow. Go live instantly and cut onboarding time from 30 minutes to under 10

sections.title: Background
content: Referral Stack is a SaaS platform focused on making affiliate management effortless for SaaS startups, digital creators, marketers, and their partners.
The product was designed and shipped in one month, with a robust design system supporting both dark and light modes to ensure team alignment and ease of use.
My role spanned product management, research, competitive analysis, and end-to-end UX/UI design.

sections.title: Core problem
content: SaaS startups and digital creators struggle to manage affiliate and referral programs efficiently. Existing tools are either overly complex requiring custom integrations or lack seamless support for essential payment processors like PayPal and Stripe.
This leads to: Time-consuming, error-prone manual tracking, difficulties in automating payouts, inefficient performance analytics, fragmented workflows, and lost revenue.
The industry is growing rapidly (U.S. affiliate marketing spend is projected to reach $12B in 2025), but many businesses are held back by tools built for large enterprises.

lists.title: Key Challenges:
items: Frustration and lost revenue due to late or inaccurate payments and fraud

sections.title: Research and Analysis
content: Primary Users: SaaS founders, digital creators, marketers, affiliate managers. Secondary Users: Affiliates/influencers, finance teams.
Pain Points Identified: NOTE: Most users wanted a unified, easy-to-use dashboard and seamless payment integration.
Market & Industry Data: Affiliate marketing is a major growth channel; 83% of consumers trust recommendations from friends/family (WSJ). Legal and compliance risks are rising due to fraud.

Competitive Analysis: Benchmarked against PromoteKit, ReferralCandy, Tolt, and Rewardful. Key Gaps: Competitors lack seamless Multi-payment support, real-time fraud prevention, and flexible UI themes.

sections.title: Design Process
content: Conducted comprehensive stakeholder interviews where 80% of participants struggled with manual tracking and 65% expressed frustration with delayed payments.
Mapped user journeys for SaaS founders, marketers, and affiliates to identify operational bottlenecks and emotional pain points.
Spearheaded the creation of a comprehensive design system in Figma, including reusable components, tokenized variables, and both dark and light modes.
Iterative prototyping with 12 representative users highlighted the value of navigation clarity and real-time performance metrics.
Optimized onboarding to be no-code and take less than 10 minutes, a significant improvement over the industry standard of 20-60 minutes.

sections.title: Solutions
content: Instant, no-code integration with PayPal and Stripe for automated payouts.
Real-time, actionable analytics and fraud detection.
Unified, user-friendly dashboard for both businesses and affiliates.
Robust design system supporting dark/light modes and branded affiliate portals.

lists.title: Key Features:
items: Instant, no-code integration with PayPal and Stripe for automated payouts.
Real-time, actionable analytics and fraud detection.
A unified, user-friendly dashboard for both businesses and affiliates.
A robust design system supporting dark/light modes, ensuring a consistent experience and rapid scaling.
Customizable commission plans and branded affiliate portals.

sections.title: Business Outcome
content: Onboarding time reduced from 30+ minutes to under 10 minutes.
Early adopters reported up to 30% sales growth after switching.
High user satisfaction reported from 134 beta testers regarding ease of use and automation.

lists.title: Results:
items: Early adopters reported up to 30% sales growth after switching to Referral Stack.
Unlimited affiliates, automated workflows, and seamless payment support enable effortless scaling.
Positive feedback highlights ease of use, automation, and the modern, accessible interface.

sections.title: Learning and next steps
content: Expanding integrations with more payment processors and CRMs.
Development of enhanced analytics and predictive insights.
Requested features: Shopify integration, Marketplace functionality, and a built-in messaging system.
